text: [Music]
it's really simple there is no balance
between hard and soft power there is
hard power and soft power and other
kinds of power that mix together in all
kinds of ways there's a lot of people
who have looked at the idea of soft
power today and really cast it aside and
said it was really a silly idea because
it only worked when our hard power was
also working and so when we were able to
demonstrate our strength and then people
felt obliged to accept our sort of value
but that it isn't the case that having
soft power papers over the failures of
hard power that doesn't work so there's
a lot of people dismissing the concept
today or they're replacing it as Joni
himself is with the notion of smart
power which is really just another way
of saying the same thing rather than use
all of these monikers and labels I
prefer to just think of power as a whole
menu of sorts of things that do blend
together and overlap and it's you choose
some and not others or you choose a
variety of things to get your objectives
done but I don't like to believe I don't
believe that there's a fixed ratio
between them
[Music]
